subject: Technology
title: The Simpsons: TV's Longest-Running Sitcom
description: One-minute skill: The Simpsons: TV's Longest-Running Sitcom.

hook.text: A cartoon family that was supposed to fill time between sketches became the longest-running primetime scripted show in US history.

buildup.text: The Simpsons started as shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show in 1987. Fox gave it a full series in 1989.

discovery.text: The show used animation's freedom to satirize politics, culture, and American life in ways live-action shows couldn't.

twist.text: The Simpsons seemingly predicted Trump's presidency, Disney buying Fox, and smartwatches years before they happened.

climax.text: After 35 seasons and 750 episodes, The Simpsons defined modern animated comedy and influenced every show that followed.

punchline.text: A filler cartoon became television's most enduring cultural mirror.

quiz.question: Where did The Simpsons originally appear?
options: As shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show
